Others: Ja Morant scored 16 points with 10 assists in the Memphis Grizzlies' 124-111 home-opening win against the Orlando Magic.
Ja Morant's energy was infectious in the Grizzlies' win.
Morant didn't have his best shooting night, connecting on 33% of his shots.
Morant had no problem navigating among the Magic's sizable interior defense, drawing several fouls and going 8-for-8 from the free-throw line.
